articles.description: EA announced on Thursday that it’s working on a Battlefield game for mobile devices that’s set to release in 2022. The game will be developed by Industrial Toys in partnership with longtime Battlefield developer DICE.
articles.content:
The hit series is coming to smartphones and tablets
Image: EA
The Battlefield series is headed to mobile devices. The hugely popular shooter franchise will make its debut on smartphones and tablets… [+1107 chars]

articles.author: Danny Palmer
articles.title: Now this botnet is hunting for unpatched Microsoft Exchange servers - ZDNet
articles.description: Prometei botnet's key goal is cryptojacking - but it's powerful capabilities could see it deployed for much more dangerous attacks.
articles.content: Cyber criminals are trying to use vulnerabilities in Microsoft Exchange servers to add to their botnet for mining cryptocurrency but the level of access they're gaining means they could use their acc… [+3870 chars]
